text_block_list.text:
In the first half of the Twinkle Series, we heard 
the curtain call with the overwhelming victory 
of “Takarazuka Kinen” by Biwa Hayahide.

And with welcoming the summer workー Team <Sirius> was preparing 
to buy a few things for summer training camp.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Fireworks, watermelons and carrots… Ah～, 
there are too many things to buy～!

It's hard to prepare, but let's stretch our 
wings when we get there. Even if it's a training 
camp, at the same time it's a break.

text_block_list.name: Shopper A
text_block_list.text: Oh!? It's Narita Brian!!

text_block_list.name: Shopper B
text_block_list.text:
Wow～, the real deal!! Her 5 length difference 
Derby, got me really excited!

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: I see…

text_block_list.name: Shopper B
text_block_list.text:
Next, is the long awaited Triple Crown “Kikkashou”! After that, 
is it after all the Arima Kinen!?

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Ah, I was worried about that too! What will it be, Trainer!?
I'm not sure yet, but we will probably go on that route.
I'm not sure yet, but we will probably go on that route.

text_block_list.name: Shopper A
text_block_list.text:
Wow! Show me your win of the title “Triple 
Crown Horse Girl” and Arima Kinen!

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: It goes without saying, every race I race I will win.

text_block_list.name: Shopper B
text_block_list.text:
Woah! I will go to see it with my family! Please show me your 
determination by winning a landslide victory!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Everyone is already talking about winning. As expected of Brian.

To be honest, I can't imagine Brian losing right now. Even if 
it's “Kikkashou” or “Arima Kinen”.

Of course, depending on the other 
party, that image may be shaken.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: The “Opponent” who can beat Brian～…
Oya? If it isn't Brian.
I'm sure she is…

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
She is the dorm head, Hishi Amazon. 
…Amazon, are you shopping too?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, I thought of making presents for all the 
hard working underclassmen who are going back 
to their parents house in summer vacation.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: You're like a mother now…

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Ehehe, it's not just a gift to take care of.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
I'm doing it as an example for even those who run. No matter who 
you are, you can face it if you have the guts!

The Horse Girl called Hishi Amazon, she seems to 
be a character with a strong and reasonable belief 
that isn't any inferior to Narita Brian.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: …Oh!? Watch out!!!!
(Truck-kun!!!!)

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Ah～, last minute safe.

text_block_list.name: Child of Shopper
text_block_list.text: Ah… *Sob*～～!!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Hey!! You have to look hard to see if there's no car coming!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Big-sister Hishiama will be watching you, so be careful about 
cars properly this time!

text_block_list.name: Child of Shopper
text_block_list.text: *Sob*～… Big-sister, thank you…

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: It was a fine play, Amazon.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
It's nothing, it's Big-sister Hishiama's job to look after folks. 
…So it was in the middle of the story.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Brian, I want to compete with you. To meet the opponent called 
the strongest, isn't it burning…!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
One day, I'll stand on the same stage 
as you! Don't you dare run away?

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text:
…I will not run away, but I won't wait. 
If you want to run with me, follow me.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Ehehe, bring it on!! Then later, there's 
an egg limited time sale, so I'll go!

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: …she is really a mother.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Well, I was surprised by the crisis, but I was more surprised at 
her power to help children～!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Don't you know about her races? Amazing legs to head at once from 
the rear to the frontー

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Some people say that they were more 
shocked by her than Brian's race.
I believe she is conscious about Brian's lack of “Opponent”.
I believe she is conscious about Brian's lack of “Opponent”.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: …Hmph.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
So, I will have a summer training camp at the villa of the Mejiro 
family, won't the 2 of you come with me?

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text:
I will have to pass. I was injured before the “Takarazuka Kinen”, 
so I have a hospital visit.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Hmm… If that's the case there is no helping it. Well then, 
Hayahide will go!? You will go right!?

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: …No, I will have to pass too.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Ehh～!? Even though there's fireworks, watermelons and carrots?

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: I'm sorry, I have something important to do.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Is it by any chance, your summer vacation homework? It seems like 
you've been writing something in your notebook for a while.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: …Eh? Wh, what is that…

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Muscle training and trunk training… Dirt dash to slope dash, gate 
training and pool training…

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
No way, are you going to do everything written on this menu!? 
During the summer vacation!?

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, from now on, you need to be prepared for the autumn race 
season. Starting from “All Comers” to the “Emperor Award Autumn” 
After running thoseー

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: …I will aim to achieve the goal of “Arima Kinen”

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Hayahide are also aiming for “Arima Kinen”!? 
That means, Hayahide and Brian there…!?

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: An “Opponent” who can beat me, huh…
